task.title: How to observe your calendar and your scheduled meetings in Outlook.
task.shortdesc: In this task we will learn how to observe our calendar and our scheduled meetings in Outlook.

prereq.p: You need to have installed Outlook on your machine.

context.p: This task can help you to observe your scheduled meetings through your calendar.

step.cmd: Observe your calendar and your scheduled meetings for the week.

result.p: Calendar is opened correctly and meetings are scheduled successfully!

example.p: You can use this function when you want to observe your scheduled meetings through your calendar.
